common.share: A lot of REFUNDS up to 10% of the purchase value from Trip|Contract Applications - Smart Payments are waiting for you. Quickly download the app at: https://apps.tripcontract.com/dl to have the interesting experience!
common.term_condition:
These terms and conditions apply to your use of the Trip|Contract application and OnOnpay service. By signing up you are agreeing to all of the terms and conditions mentioned here.

network.title: Network connection information
network.error: There is no network connection to perform this service. Please check your WiFi or 3G / 4G connection in the mobile device.

delete.title: Delete notification message
delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the notification message from the app?

support.title: Customer support
support.description: Press Call to connect to the operator (1800 6751) Note that your call will be subject to telecommunication charges as specified.

over_3.description:
Your account has been locked due to incorrect login 
 three times. Please call the operator for assistance.

update_app.title: There is a new update!
update_app.content:
Please update the application 
to use the new features

safety_information.title: Information security
safety_information.Nội dung: Trip|Contract is committed not to disclose any of your information in any form to third parties.

logout.are_you_sure:
Are you sure you want to 
log out the account?

to the provider.

You canceled this transaction. 
Account in your account 
 is preserved.

Please wait for the transaction to complete.

Please notify the recipient 
sign up account to receive money.
